sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Pantalogia. The saints abundance opened. / By Thomas Sterry preacher of the gospel. Published at the earnest intreaty of some friends. Imprimatur John Downame. Sterry, Thomas.
[6], 22 p.
Printed by F: Neile for William Wenborn, at the signe of the Rose at the Bridge-foot., London, : 1646.
The first word of the title is printed in Greek characters. Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] 2d". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Pantalogia. The saints abundance opened. / By Thomas Sterry preacher of the gospel. Published at the earnest intreaty of some friends. Imprimatur John Downame. Sterry, Thomas.
[6], 22 p.
Printed by F: Neile for William Wenborn, at the signe of the Rose at the Bridge-foot., London, : 1646.
The first word of the title is printed in Greek characters. Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] 2d". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
William Wenborn
F: Neile
the signe of the Rose at the Bridge-foot.
>>>>>>> imprintparse
